value.name: Police kill emotionally disturbed man, family to sue
value.description: Officers went to the home of 48-year-old Samuel Cruz in New Rochelle. He was emotionally disturbed and his wife had called for help. In a confrontation that followed, Cruz was shot by police.

value.name: Family sues after mentally distressed man shot
value.description: It's been five months since New Rochelle Police responded to a 911 call to help a mentally distressed Samuel Cruz. Many questions remain, including why police escalated a tense situation by ...
